infos.text: This is the last day i've got to convince humans! I better get this right.

infos.speaker: president
infos.text: Greetings. This is the last time you'll have to do this job. After today, our plan will come to fruitition...
Well, that's only if you succeed today.
After most humans have left for Jupiter, we will engage for battle. However, we want things to go as smooth as possible.
Our new mind control weapon will be used. But it has a flaw: It only works on humans with green hair.
As you probably guessed, you will have to convince them to change their hair color.
You seem to be pretty popular already. Just tell them that it is trendy, or maybe that it will increase their intelligence. It's up to you.

infos.speaker: president
infos.text: By the way, our scientists discovered a bug in our disguise software. You must avoid to say metal names. That's it for today. Good Luck. *Clic*
